  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明

    Use trainingset.add (new Instance(data,target,name,source)) instead.

    Use trainingset.addThruPipe (new Instance(data,target,name,source)) instead.

    cc.mallet.types.MatrixOps.dot(double[], double[])
    Use dotProduct()
